description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Physics Lab is an intuitive yet powerfully complex 2D physics game. Build anything you can imagine using shapes, joints, springs, motors, particles, gravity, emitters, textures and more. Then strap custom controls onto your creation! Includes 12 video tutorials.
description.short: Physics Lab is an intuitive yet powerfully complex 2D physics game. Build anything you can imagine using shapes, joints, springs, motors, particles, gravity, emitters, textures and more. Then strap custom controls onto your creation! Includes 12 video tutorials.
